thread.title: College sports: Longtime St. Lawrence University sports information director Johnson to retire
thread.title_full: College sports: Longtime St. Lawrence University sports information director Johnson to retire

title: College sports: Longtime St. Lawrence University sports information director Johnson to retire
text:
A A 
CANTON — St. Lawrence University sports information director Wally Johnson announced Wednesday that he will retire on June 1, 2016. 
Johnson joined SLU’s athletic department in July of 1975 and is best known as the color commentator for St. Lawrence University men’s hockey radio broadcasts. 
He is a native of St. Albans, Vt., and graduated from the University of Vermont in 1971. Johnson was inducted in 2013 into the College Sports Information Directors’ Association Hall of Fame.
